title: Evaluate Results
description: Assess the Random Forest model results in relation to business goals and determine if it meets success criteria. Review business goals from Milestone 1. Evaluate model metrics (RMSE, MAE, R-squared) against success thresholds. Determine if model accuracy is sufficient for health policy decisions. Provide clear recommendation (approve/reject) with justification.

title: Review the Process
description: Review the entire CRISP-DM process from Phase 1 through Phase 4 to identify any gaps or issues. Evaluate Phase 1 (Business Understanding), Phase 2 (Data Understanding), Phase 3 (Data Preparation), and Phase 4 (Modeling). Identify steps executed properly and report issues that were missed or overlooked. Highlight quality assurance concerns and document corrective actions needed.

title: Determine Next Steps
description: Decide on the project path forward based on evaluation results. Consider possible actions: Deploy (move model to production), Further Iterate (additional modeling cycles), or Abandon/Restart (project does not meet requirements). For each action, document reasons for, reasons against, requirements, and timeline. Provide final recommendation with clear decision, justification, and action plan.
